name: NBA NOW Mobile Basketball Game
description:
If you loved NBA Then, you’ll love NBA NOW. Build your championship team and become the greatest player, GM, coach of all time.
FEATURES
- Stay up-to-date on NBA news with the latest stats being updated in-game each day
- Test your NBA knowledge - predict which NBA teams will win during the regular season and earn rewards for predicting correctly each day
- Play on-the-go with simple one-touch controls designed for the perfect mobile experience
- Build your championship team of rookies and veterans alike
- Play against players around the world
[Device Requirement]
OS: 8.0 and higher
Device: iPhone 6s and newer
NBA NOW is available in 한국어, English, 日本語, 中文简体, 中文繁體, Français, Deutsch, Português, Español, Türkçe.
 There may be additional costs when trying to obtain certain items.
Access authorization notice for gameplay
CAMERA: HIVE requires access to your camera to take profile images.
PHOTOS: HIVE requires access to your photos to change profile images or save/load the game screen.
